```{r echo=TRUE, results='asis'}
library(stringr)
library(knitr)

dd <- readLines("tournamentinfo.txt");
dd <- str_remove_all(as.character(dd), "-")
dd <- str_squish(dd);

pair <- c();
player_name <- c();
player_state <- c();
tot <- c();
pre <- c();




for(i in seq(5,length(dd),3))
{


  d1 <- scan(text = dd[i], what = "character", sep = "|");
  d2 <- scan(text = dd[i+1], what = "character", sep = "|");

  pair <- append(pair, d1[1]);
  player_name <- append(player_name,d1[2]);
  player_state <- append(player_state,d2[1]);
  tot <- append(tot,d1[3]);

  t0 <- str_replace_all(as.character(d2[2]),">"," ");
  t0 <- scan(text = t0, what="character")[4];
  pre <- append(pre,t0);


}

data <- data.frame(
  index = pair,
  name = player_name,
  state = player_state,
  total = tot,
  pre_rating = pre
);

kable(data)
write.csv(data,"tournament.csv")


```
